application-form-type.legend: How would you like to apply?

new-application.label: A new application
new-application.hint: You will need a controlled drug activity user list to upload later

continue-an-application.label: Continue an application
continue-an-application.hint: An incomplete application stays on the system for 5 days and is then deleted

licensee-type.legend: What type of licensee are you?

existing-licensee-renew-or-change-site.label: Existing licensee renewing or changing a currently licensed site

existing-licensee-applying-for-new-site.label: Existing licensee applying for a new site

companies-house-number.legend: Has your Companies House reference number changed since your last application?

companies-house-name.legend: Has your registered name at Companies House changed since your last application?

why-requesting-new-licence.legend: Why are you requesting a new license?

moving-date.hint: Enter the date you plan to move sites

contractual-agreement.legend: Is the new site part of a contractual agreement?

company-number.label: Company number (optional)
company-number.hint: Enter the  number issued by Companies House

is-premises-address-same.legend: Is the premises address the same as the licence holder address?

responsible-officer-dbs-certificate.label: I confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

responsible-officer-dbs-application-full.label: Full name
responsible-officer-dbs-application-full.hint: Enter the name as it appears on their DBS application

responsible-officer-dbs-update-subscript.legend: Has the responsible officer subscribed to DBS updates?

guarantor-full-name.label: Full name
guarantor-full-name.hint: A guarantor makes sure everyone in the business operates within the licence conditions

guarantor-confirmed-dbs.label: I confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

guarantor-dbs-full-name.label: Full name
guarantor-dbs-full-name.hint: Enter the name as it appears on their DBS application or current certificate

is-guarantor-subscribed.legend: Has the guarantor subscribed to DBS updates?

has-anyone-received-criminal-conviction.legend: Has anyone employed by your company ever received criminal convictions?

which-chemical.label: Which chemical are you applying for?

which-operation.legend: Which operation applies to this licence for {{values.which-chemical}}

lab-testing-and-processing.label: Laboratory testing and processing, including forensic analysis

what-operation.label: What other operation applies to the licence?

chemicals-used-for.label: Tell us why you need these chemicals and what they’ll be used for

main-customers.label: Tell us about your main customers

main-suppliers.label: Tell us about your main suppliers

security-measures.legend: What security measures do you have in place at the premises?

lockable-physical-security.label: Lockable physical security, such as a room safe, cabinet for the storage of the precursor chemicals

security-guards.label: The attendance of the security guards

how-secure-premises.label: Describe how you secure your premises

storage-and-handling.label: Describe how you make sure chemicals are stored and handled securely

chemical-stock-control.label: Describe how you manage chemical stock control

legitimate-use.label: Describe how you work to make sure end products are used legitimately

operating-procedures-and-auditing.label: Summarise your standard operating procedures and auditing practices for the use or disposal of chemicals

is-discharge-all-licence-responsibilitie.hint: If you answer ‘No’, your registration might take longer and may not be approved.
is-discharge-all-licence-responsibilitie.legend: Will the regulatory affairs and compliance officer discharge all licence responsibilities?

explain-not-discharge-responsibilities.label: Explain why the officer will not discharge all licence responsibilities

extra-information.label: Add any extra information you think might help your application (optional)

declaration-check.label: I understand and accept this declaration
